name: S1MULA710N
description:
This game was made for the GMTK game jam 2021 with the theme linked together. This game focuses on a robotic character which gets around being attracted to gemstones. The game is supposed to be 5 to 10 minutes long. 

If you have at least a little bit of time, please consider to rate the game and write a comment it really helps ;)

CONTROLS:

Left Click - Interaction with gemstones

R - Restart Level

M - Return to Menu

STORY:

You (main character), is a robot inside a simulated world, doing very easy tasks.  After a while you hear a voice telling you how to get free, how to get from the simulated world to the real one. You follow him mostly out of curiosity, he gets you to one of the levels an tells you that he needs your help to get from the game himself.

P.S:

This game is supposed to be downloaded for the best experience (mostly graphical). The HTML file playable in browser is mostly for convenience, so anybody who wants the better graphical experience should download the game instead of playing in the browser.
